explains: n. 缺乏；<古>食物短缺，饥荒

sentences.en: There was a dearth of reliable information on the subject.
sentences.cn: 关于这个课题缺乏可靠资料。

sentences.en: Two years ago, Rupert Murdoch's daughter, Elisabeth, spoke of the "unsettling dearth of integrity across so many of our institutions."
sentences.cn: 两年前，鲁珀特·默多克的女儿伊丽莎白曾说过，“我们许多机构缺乏诚信，这令人不安。”

sentences.en: There is, however, no dearth of technological resources, rather, managers in the service sector fail to take advantage of widely available skills and machines.
sentences.cn: 然而，技术资源并不缺乏，相反，服务部门的管理人员未能利用广泛可用的技能和机器。
